name: MIS Current Balances of 200 Pounds or More
description: v1.0 HQ9015 This report returns prisoners in the estate with open bookings who have current balances of 200 pounds or more.

dataset.name: Balances 200 Plus
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.FIRST_NAME, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.SURNAME, CASE WHEN AT_DOB.DAY_DATE < '31/12/9000' THEN AT_DOB.DAY_DATE END AS DATE_OF_BIRTH, AT_CASELOADS_OFF_CURR_BAL.ESTABLISHMENT_CODE_NK, SUM(AT_FACT_OFF_ACC_CURR_BALANCE.GROSS_BALANCE) AS SUM_OF_CURRENT_ACCOUNT_BALANCE FROM BODIMIS.DIM_ESTABLISHMENT AT_CASELOADS_OFF_CURR_BAL, BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENDER_BOOKING AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING, BODIMIS.DIM_DATE AT_DOB, BODIMIS.FACT_OFF_ACC_CURR_BALANCE AT_FACT_OFF_ACC_CURR_BALANCE WHERE (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.ALIAS_OFFENDER_SK = AT_FACT_OFF_ACC_CURR_BALANCE.ALIAS_OFFENDER_SK AND AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.BOOKING_SEQ = 1) AND (AT_FACT_OFF_ACC_CURR_BALANCE.ESTABLISHMENT_SK = AT_CASELOADS_OFF_CURR_BAL.ESTABLISHMENT_SK) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.BIRTH_DATE_SK = AT_DOB.DATE_SK) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK IN (SELECT CSL.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK FROM BODIMIS.DIM_STAFF_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOAD SAC, BODIMIS.DIM_CASELOAD_SECURITY_LIST CSL WHERE SAC.CASELOAD_ID = CSL.CASELOAD_CODE AND SAC.USERNAME = UPPER('DPRWS') AND CSL.ENDYEAR >= TO_CHAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 'YYYY') - 6)) AND ((AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.MIS_CURRENT_RECORD_IND = 'Y') AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.BOOKING_STATUS = 'O')) GROUP BY AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.FIRST_NAME, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.SURNAME, CASE WHEN AT_DOB.DAY_DATE < '31/12/9000' THEN AT_DOB.DAY_DATE END, AT_CASELOADS_OFF_CURR_BAL.ESTABLISHMENT_CODE_NK HAVING SUM(AT_FACT_OFF_ACC_CURR_BALANCE.GROSS_BALANCE) >= 200), dataset_ AS (SELECT OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, FIRST_NAME, SURNAME, DATE_OF_BIRTH, ESTABLISHMENT_CODE_NK, SUM_OF_CURRENT_ACCOUNT_BALANCE FROM dataset_base_)

dataset.name: MIS Load End Date
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG.BUSINESS_DATE FROM BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG WHERE (BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG.LOAD_ID = (SELECT MAX(LOAD_ID) FROM BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG WHERE NOT LOAD_END_DATETIME IS NULL))), dataset_ AS (SELECT BUSINESS_DATE FROM dataset_base_)

report.name: Current Balances of 200 Pounds or More

errors.error: Error: Error: Query failed: GENERIC_USER_ERROR: Failed To Get Query Passthrough Schema
